name: @mokemokechicken/ai-shogun
description: Codex-powered multi-agent workspace runner with web UI

scripts.bootstrap: npm install && npm --prefix shared install && npm --prefix server install && npm --prefix web install
scripts.dev:all: npm --prefix server run dev & npm --prefix web run dev
scripts.build: npm --prefix shared run build && npm --prefix server run build && npm --prefix web run build
scripts.prepack: npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm --prefix shared run lint && npm --prefix server run lint && npm --prefix web run lint
scripts.test: npm --prefix shared run test && npm --prefix server run test && npm --prefix web run test
